name: Boxes 📦📦📦📦📦📦
description:
LDJAM41 • theme : "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres"

Incompatible generes as in an unlikely pair,
in this case, this is
a "game" created by a "non-gamer."

this is an “art game” ( also, it is my first solo game jam. ) made with Twine2 • music: “The Small” by Kevin MacLeod ( http://incompetech.com ) (CC-BY 3.0) • Thanks to youtube tutorials by Dan Cox and DigitalExposureTV • ezgif.com • w3schools.com • inspired by Nathalie Lawhead @alienmelon, @andyman404, and many others • all drawings by wanniwanni • twitter @panic_button_hi

Twine is an open-source tool for telling interactive, nonlinear stories.
www.Twinery.org

What is Ludum Dare?
Ludum Dare literally means to give or offer a game; it is also an expression meaning to give or let someone have their fun. www.ludumdare.com/compo/2010/08/18/a-shocking-question/
